# externalIdentifier

## Summary

Provides a reference to a resource outside the scope of SPDX-3.0 content
that uniquely identifies an Element.


## Description

ExternalIdentifier points to a resource outside the scope of SPDX-3.0 content
that uniquely identifies an Element.
